title: From [Congo/Kenya/Sudan/South Sudan] to the World
excerpt: Our mining operations span across multiple locations, including the rich gold deposits of Kalimva in Congo, Migori in Kenya, Kapoeta in Sudan, and Budi County in South Sudan. Discover our impactful projects that drive economic growth and sustainability.
content: Our mining operations span across multiple locations, including the rich gold deposits of Kalimva in Congo, Migori in Kenya, Kapoeta in Sudan, and Budi County in South Sudan. Discover our impactful projects that drive economic growth and sustainability.
